name: BENEVOLENT INTEGRATED RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: The B.I.R.D.S. It is a non-profit, non-government organization.During the year 2004-2005 the organization Benevolent Integrated Rural Development Society at Suri , Birbhum District in West Bengal, primarily with a view to carry on welfare and sustainable rural community developmental activities at the grass-root level to provide relief and succor to the poorest of the poor and the have-nots.
